aboutpara: Hi-Res stands for High Resolution, High Resilience, and High Resolve. It seeks an alternative way to convey environmental and socio-economic data with high resolution that is accessible to everyone. It focuses on resilience, to prepare and empower communities around the world in the face of climate change, resource scarcities and poverty. It emphasizes resolve, as the catalyst to tackling complex challenges head-on. Hi-Res is created by Jasper Bates, an environmental economist with a passion for spatial analytics and data-driven solutions.
